General.Name: Societe Marseillaise du Tunnel Prado Carenage S.A.
General.Description: Société Marseillaise du Tunnel Prado Carénage constructs and operates tunnels in France. It operates the Prado Carénage, Rège and Prado Sud, Prado South tunnels. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Marseille, France.
